title: Bruce Springsteen: "I'm Here To Take You Out Of Time" | Colbert Classic
description:
Ever wondered why The Boss plays such long concerts? "It's medicinal," he claims. Bruce Springsteen describes how it feels to be on stage amid the cathartic group experience that makes his concerts the stuff of legend in this epic 4-part interview from 2016.
